Description:
More chaos , more destruction , more Rufus . Not one, not two , but three Rufus turn the world upside down in a highly anticipated comedy adventure point & click " Goodbye, on deposit ! " Organon plotting to destroy on deposit , honey Goul (again) disappeared, and the antihero Rufus confused all the time at his feet .
All dreamed about resourceful and freedom Rufus , was to leave the planet on deposit , turned into a giant dump and go to Elysium - the space station and a paradise for high society . Goul , a girl from the Elysium from which Rufus once lost his head , still remains the key to its aspirations ... and to the door that leads into the space paradise. So Rufus seems designed the perfect plan .
However, everything that could go wrong , of course, went wrong. Rufus comes to life ( first incognito ) on board the cruiser of fierce minions Organon and Goul disappears somewhere . When Rufus stumbles upon a machine to clone , he decides that he had found a way out. Clone can help him get out of this mess . However strange error confuses all the cards , and Goul again eludes our hero. Now out three main tasks : It must again find Goul , get into Elysium and save on deposit from the destruction which threatens her Organon .
These tasks can be done only three Rufus - and here the hapless inventor decides to clone himself ! This can be great to confuse the player : The player "Farewell on deposit ! " must control all three
Rufus , so that all the tasks they performed together - despite the fact that Rufus is often inhibited by himself.
